title: Coordinate a Championship Parade
description: After winning a championship, a team needs to work with the city to plan a championship parade.

tasks.description: Work with city officials to plan and approve a parade route.
tasks.expected_outcome: A final parade route is agreed upon.

tasks.description: Secure all necessary permits from the city for street closures and security.
Coordinate with local police for security and traffic management along the parade route.
tasks.expected_outcome: A comprehensive security plan is in place.

tasks.description: Announce the details of the parade (date, time, route) to the public.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent releases the parade information to the media and fans.
